sentences.en: ...the development of the fetus in the womb.
a baby's development in the womb
A scan determines the position of the baby in the womb.
sentences.cn: 扫描可以确定胎儿在子宮中的位置.

sentences.en: A second is, how does that change the environment in the womb?
sentences.cn: 其二是, 这样会造成子宫发生何种改变?

sentences.en: Authorities believe her womb was cut open after she was knocked unconscious.
sentences.cn: 警方相信她在打昏后子宫被割开.

sentences.en: Becker claimed he was trying to create a womb - like environment for his patients.
sentences.cn: -贝克尔宣称他想为他的病人创造出一种像子宫一样的环境.

sentences.en: Blessed art thou among women and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.
sentences.cn: 女中尔为赞美,尔胎子耶稣,并为赞美.

sentences.en: Boys will play with themselves, even in the womb.
sentences.cn: 就是还在子宫内?男孩子都会自娱.

sentences.en: Embryos that fit the bill are then implanted in the mother's womb.
sentences.cn: 那些符合条件的晶胚于是就被植入母亲的子宫.

sentences.en: He came alive to me, delivered suddenly from the womb of his purposeless splendor.
sentences.cn: 盖茨比在我眼中有了生命, 忽然之间从他那子宫般的毫无目的的豪华里分娩了出来.

sentences.en: The baby's head was starting to emerge from the womb.
sentences.cn: 婴儿的头开始从母亲的子宮中露出来.

sentences.en: The child quickened in her womb , ie She felt the movements of the foetus.
The womb ; the female organ in which the foetus grows during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 女性器官—间儿在子宫面生长.

sentences.en: Then God remembered Rachel ; he listened to her and opened her womb.
sentences.cn: 22神顾念拉结, 应允了她,使她能生育.

sentences.en: There are many events in the womb of time.
sentences.cn: 有许多事件正在酝酿之中.

sentences.en: This olfactory sense develops in the womb.
sentences.cn: 这一嗅觉在子宫内形成。

trans.tran_en: the part of a woman’s or female animal’s body where her baby grows before it is born
